Posts.Content: Hi, Sorry for asking a daft question. I went to the gp on Monday as I found a lump. The gp said he would refer me to a breast clinic one stop shop. He said I would be seen and get the results the same day. Is this right or did I mishear? Roughly how long doas it take to get an appointment. Can't think of much else
Posts.Title: Timescale confusion from gl
